snippet: Nigel Doughty, co-founder of Doughty Hanson, "Britain's most secretive private equity firm," died on Saturday at age 54, The Telegraph reports.
abstract: Nigel Doughty, co-founder of Doughty Hanson, "Britain's most secretive private equity firm," died on Saturday at age 54, The Telegraph reports.
